# Implementation Reports

Documentation of feature implementations and bug fixes.

## Implementation Reports

This directory contains detailed reports of feature implementations and bug fixes, including:

- Feature implementation summaries
- Bug fix documentation
- Before/after comparisons
- Verification checklists
- Epic-specific implementations (GitHub, JIRA, Linear)

## Recent Implementations

All implementation reports are available in this directory. Key implementations include:

- **Epic Attachments** - Implementation across GitHub, JIRA, and Linear adapters
- **MCP Tools** - Model Context Protocol tool implementations
- **Environment Loading** - Configuration and environment discovery fixes
- **Linear Adapter** - Bug fixes and initialization improvements

## Archive

Older implementation reports have been moved to the [Archive](../../_archive/implementations/).
